name: Night Cabum (Beta Version)
description:
Night Cabum is made with unity by MasterD Game Jam 3.0.

The game is still in beta, will have plenty of improvements but can play it. It has mechanics such as:

-> Enemy/player destruction system;

->System of platforms that fall after x seconds;

-> Trampoline simulation system;

-> Fan system, required to resort to the wind generated by it to reach certain locations;

-> Pause and gameover;

-> Item collection system and end-of-game score

-> Main Menu;

-> etc ...

I hope you enjoy the game and have fun playing it ;)
